About the.RAM.PLC

Who We Are

the.R.A.M. stands for Research, Analysis, and Monitoring — the foundation of everything we do. Our work helps businesses make smarter, safer, and faster decisions through verified data and actionable insights.

6+ Years

of Excellence

Who We Are

The.RAM.PLC is a leading consultancy firm specializing in Primary Source Verification (PSV), Background Screening, Mystery Shopping, Data Analytics, and Risk Assessment. Based in Addis Ababa, Ethiopia, we serve clients across Africa with integrity, innovation, and excellence as our founding principles.

Our Team

Our team comprises seasoned professionals with extensive experience in verification services, data analytics, risk assessment, and mystery shopping. With deep regional expertise and a global outlook, we are committed to continuous learning and staying at the forefront of industry developments.

Our Ethics

We adhere to the highest ethical standards in all our operations, ensuring confidentiality, security, and accuracy in every project we undertake. Our commitment to ethical business practices is unwavering, forming the foundation of our reputation and client trust.

GLOBAL REACH

Our Worldwide Presence

With a strong presence across Africa, Eastern Europe, and beyond, we bring global expertise with a focus on emerging markets. Ethiopia serves as our strategic hub for African operations.

Why Choose the.RAM.plc

the.RAM.plc stands out as Africa’s leading AI-first verification and compliance company. Our commitment to automation, intelligent technology, and data-driven excellence ensures faster results, greater accuracy, and actionable insights for every client. We combine a proven track record with cutting-edge innovation, an expert team, and unwavering ethics to deliver superior outcomes—every time.

AI-First Leadership

Automated, intelligent, and data-driven solutions for the modern era—delivering speed, accuracy, and actionable insights.

Proven Track Record

Over a decade of successful consultancy and verification services across Africa.

Expert Team

Highly qualified professionals with industry-specific and technical expertise.

Innovative Solutions

Cutting-edge methodologies and AI technologies for optimal results.

Ethical Conduct

Unwavering commitment to integrity, privacy, and professional ethics.

Automated, efficient processes ensuring prompt delivery of all services.

Smart reminders, follow-ups, and feedback via SMS, email, and cloud calls—no manual intervention needed.

AI-powered dashboards and analytics provide actionable intelligence and transparency for every client.

Global regulatory alignment and trusted verification for risk mitigation and peace of mind.

Our Services

We offer a comprehensive range of consultancy services designed to help businesses navigate the complexities of today's market and achieve sustainable growth across Africa.

Primary Source Verification (PSV)
We verify credentials directly from the issuing source, ensuring authenticity and compliance with global regulatory requirements. AI automates reminders, follow-ups, and feedback for a seamless PSV process.
Background Screening
Comprehensive background checks powered by AI and ML to help you make informed hiring decisions and mitigate employment risks. Automated reminders and feedback keep candidates engaged and processes moving.
Immigration Compliance Services
Expert assistance navigating complex immigration laws, including visa processing, audits, and documentation support. AI-driven reminders and automation accelerate every step.
Media Consultancy
Strategic media services including public relations, crisis management, and social media strategy development. AI-powered sentiment analysis and smart communication tools included.
Data Analysis
Transform raw data into actionable insights to drive strategic decision-making and business growth. AI and automation power every stage of the process.
Data Science
Advanced algorithms and machine learning to uncover meaningful patterns and predict future trends. AI-first, predictive, and actionable.
Marketing Services
Comprehensive marketing solutions to build and promote your brand effectively in the digital age. AI-driven targeting, automation, and analytics included.
Payment Processing for Digital Applications
Secure and efficient payment processing solutions for digital applications and platforms. AI-driven fraud detection and automated compliance included.
Website and Web Apps Design for Digital Health
Specialized web and app design services for digital health and other sectors requiring regulatory compliance. AI and automation ensure compliance and user-centric design.
General Merchant
Comprehensive trading and merchant solutions across various sectors and markets. AI-powered analytics and automation for supply chain optimization.
Drug Testing Services
Comprehensive drug testing solutions for pre-employment screening and workplace safety programs. AI-driven scheduling, reminders, and reporting.
Specialized Database Checks
Comprehensive database searches including OFAC, FACIS, and sex offender registries for thorough screening. AI automates and accelerates screening for compliance.
